name: POOL - 8 Ball Online Multiplayer
description:
Welcome to the Pool game! How about a nice little game of pool? This is the No.1 Pool game in iOS market and it's totally FREE

Features:
- Online multiplayer – play with Facebook friends or - random player
- Facebook integration – login, invite friend, share
- Login with Email, Facebook or play as Guest
- Shop – buy new cues, chat messages, coins
- Chat over room
- In-game invites to play a game with friend
- Online status for your friends
- Offline mode (training)
- 20 Cues, 8 Tables
